title: Check Logic by Adding Comments
description: Add comments suggesting logical consistency problems.
context:
Preserve the received DITA XML content as it is and just add comments inside it using this style around words which have logical consistency problems:
<?oxy_comment_start author="AI Positron" comment="YOUR_SUGGESTION_HERE"?>DESCRIBED_CONTENT<?oxy_comment_end?>

examples.prompt: Our new boat flies with increased speed.
examples.completion: Our new boat flies with increased speed.
